channel.title: YanScape PK
channel.description:
[center][b]Base: Crazy PvP Camelot Edition[/center][/b]
[center][b]Type: Pking Based[/center][/b]
Ok, well I started this server awhile ago. Back when Crazy PVP was just released. I cleaned up ALOT of things to make it more stable and more fun. I have a custom client that you will have to change the IP to the correct thing (localhost).
Here are some pictures....
[img]http://www.picstation.net/image-7FD4_4A73617D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-8AC6_4A73617D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-EB52_4A73617D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-C094_4A73617D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-1155_4A73617D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-708A_4A73614D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-8588_4A73614D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-C36F_4A73614D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-CB77_4A73614D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-8049_4A73614D.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-0F9E_4A73610B.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-DBA0_4A73610B.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-5F5B_4A73610B.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-9328_4A73610B.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.picstation.net/image-CF98_4A73610B.jpg[/img]
Server Link - [url=http://uppit.com/v/1XT98KF9]http://uppit.com/v/1XT98KF9[/url] Client Link - http://www.megashare.com/1288064
This server has working D Claws, Statius, Morrigan, Zuriels, and Vesta!

item.title: YanScape PK
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Jake Bryan Jones, post:7, topic:292149”]Lmao, This is sad. Yall were not even here when Zoft aka Josh was here and he was a top of Primadude ect. His Rep was reseted.

Good Job Zoft.[/quote]
lol i was here before him also rep doesn’t mean crap its just a number also if your going to try to through, " oh look at you Mr. 45 rep ", i can tell you this Ive released 2 things with the intent of them not being used so don’t try to say that, also another thing… i got nothing else

Read full topic

item.title: YanScape PK
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“colin256, post:2, topic:292149”]1. the pics say rune-kingdom
2.u got 10 rep (i know i do to) but i don’t think i trust u to much
3.the server download it called files.rar wtf
4.i would not download it
5.it a keylogger or something or he leached[/quote]

  1. Look in his signature.
  2. Reputation means nothing.
  3. What if it was called ‘server.rar’? Would that make it less suspicious to you?
  4. Then don’t post.
  5. And where’s proof that it’s a keylogger?

Read full topic

item.title: YanScape PK
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

  1. Check my posts. I’m the owner of both YanScape and Rune-Kingdom. I switched the name because I no-longer liked YanScape.
  2. I have 100 some rep but I got it reset.
  3. The server is inside the files folder.
  4. Noone gives a shit or will ever give a shit about you.
    And finally
  5. I leeched nothing no proof = not legit I suggest you bring evidence to your next argument. GF.

Read full topic
